items.title: Everything you need to know about the 2025 NRL and NRLW grand finals
items.summary: It will be a busy day of footy on Sunday with both the NRL and NRLW grand finals taking place. Here's what you need to know.

items.title: When daylight saving time starts in Australia — and what to do with your clocks
items.summary: Here's everything you need to know, including tips on how to adjust.

items.title: Police say they 'will not rest' despite scaling back search for boy missing in outback
items.summary: No significant evidence was found to indicate where Gus may have gone during the massive search involving police, defence force personnel and large numbers of volunteers.

items.title: Federal government seeks answers over Australians on intercepted Gaza flotilla
items.summary: Embassy staff in Tel Aviv were travelling to Ktzi'ot — a detention centre in Israel's south — to provide consular assistance to any detained Australians.

items.title: New twist in 'offensive' pamphlet saga targeting teal MP Allegra Spender
items.summary: Legal action follows an investigation by the electoral watchdog into allegedly unauthorised pamphlets targeting the independent MP that she had said were part of a campaign of "dirty tricks".

items.title: Man dead and teenager in critical condition after helicopter crash in Sydney
items.summary: The crash occurred at Bankstown in Sydney's south-west about 1.30pm on Friday.

items.title: UK police name Jewish men killed in Manchester synagogue attack
items.summary: Three others were injured in the attack, which took place on Yom Kippur, the most sacred day of the Jewish calendar.

items.title: New trick Australians are using to 'maximise' tax returns — but beware of the risks
items.summary: It might be free to use and readily available, but it could also be giving incorrect advice.

items.title: Court rules on appeal for underworld figure Tony Mokbel
items.summary: Three judges overturned two of the 60-year-old's convictions, but he must face a retrial in one of them, while an appeal of a third conviction was dismissed.

items.title: Why experts are 'rewriting' Australia's bushfire risk this summer
items.summary: Unusual weather patterns and climate change are raising concerns for parts of Australia, as well as popular travel destinations.

items.title: What we know so far as Donald Trump's Gaza deal deadline approaches
items.summary: US President Donald Trump has warned Hamas will "pay in hell" if they don't agree to the ceasefire plan.

items.title: Israel says more than 400 people detained from Gaza aid flotilla, will start deportations
items.summary: Six Australians are among those Israeli forces detained after they intercepted several vessels that had been bound for Gaza.

items.title: NIMBYs, YIMBYs — and BIMBYs: The new group in Australia's housing stoush
items.summary: As state governments roll out plans to battle Australia's housing crisis, community groups are mobilising to have a say in how their suburbs are — or are not — changed.

items.title: In a battle to build, these five charts show Labor's housing headache
items.summary: There are doubts major inroads into Australia's housing supply problem can be made in a couple of years and questions over the government's "ambitious" 2029 target. So, what can be done?

items.title: Albanese welcomes PNG's decision to sign landmark defence pact
items.summary: The pact will elevate the Pacific partnership, ensuring an attack on one would be a "danger to the peace and security of both countries".

items.title: I started feeling sick making lunch — and never could've expected what came next
items.summary: Corinne Laurent doesn’t believe she would still be alive if not for her smartwatch.

items.title: 'No more signs of life': Dozens remain missing after Indonesian school collapse
items.summary: After days of rescue operations, 59 people were still feared buried under the rubble after at least five people had been confirmed dead.

items.title: Animal shelter accused of having 'blood on its hands' after euthanising 12-week-old puppy
items.summary: A couple who had fostered the dog, Murphy, had called Victoria's Lost Dogs Home to ask how he was going, only to be told he would be put down.

items.title: Man cleared of involvement after police swoop on property in search for Dezi Freeman
items.summary: Police hunting Australia's most wanted fugitive have targeted an area far away from where he was last sighted after he allegedly shot dead two officers.

items.title: Erin Patterson to appeal murder convictions over deadly mushroom lunch, lawyer says
items.summary: Patterson's legal team will have 28 days to lodge the relevant paperwork before a court considers whether to approve the appeal.

items.title: Magnitude-6.9 earthquake kills more than 70 people in the Philippines
items.summary: The quake, which struck off the central island of Cebu, was the country's deadliest in more than a decade.

items.title: Is your sunscreen safe? What to know amid Australia's SPF ratings storm
items.summary: Eighteen sunscreens have either been recalled or had their sale paused in Australia. Here's what you need to know as the weather gets warmer.

items.title: Jane Goodall, pioneering scientist and conservationist, dies at 91
items.summary: The primatologist drew the public into the wild with her groundbreaking research, later shifting to climate advocacy.

items.title: It happened 'by accident', but Mark is helping tackle a $2.7bn Australian problem
items.summary: Loneliness among men has been described as a "crisis" in Australia, and its estimated to cost the health system billions each year.
